name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in deploying Machine Learning (ML) solutions and leveraging AI technologies. Proficient in **Python**, with hands-on expertise in **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, **NLP**, and cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Skilled in data manipulation and analysis using **SQL**, and experienced in managing ML workflows with **MLOps** principles and tools. Solid understanding of LLM frameworks such as **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, and **LangFuse**, alongside extensive knowledge in vector databases.

Adept at developing robust data pipelines and integrating statistical methodologies to enhance model performance. Strong command of mathematics and statistics to inform algorithm design and optimization. Experienced in employing **DevOps** practices to streamline development processes and improve application delivery. Committed to building innovative AI-powered applications that create real-world impact while maintaining adherence to industry compliance standards.
